basic.description: Students will learn skills required for conducting therapy using approaches other than Cognitive Behavioural Therapy.   (e.g., Interpersonal Psychotherapy for Depression (Klerman model), Systemic Family Therapy).  A blend of classroom instruction, videotaped therapy sessions, observation, modeling, feedback and supervised practice is used.  The approach taught in any given year will depend upon the availability of instructors.  (3 hrs)
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Advanced Therapy I
